list.desc: A basic module which contains a search bar
A basic module which is use to display the results list
A basic module which allows you to select a template for query's results and set few options
A basic module which allows you to navigate through results and modify the number of items per page
Aggregation module allows you to built and personalize an aggregation and its childs
A module that allows you to add Boolean logic and hierarchy between your filters
An Advanced module which allows you to customize you request with sorts, keywords ... and see how looks your request in elasticsearch language
Curiosity's log console. Contains few information like status error ect
An Advanced module which you can use to add information to your context, each informations are synchronized with es server
